definition: to win the hearts of the people/to be popular among the masses

sentences.english: Chinese government is popular with the people because the government brings stability and wealth to the people.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府卻因爲爲人民帶來了穩定和財富而深得民心。

sentences.english: He pilled with grievous taxes and quite lost their hearts.
sentences.chinese: 他用苛捐雜稅剝奪百姓，失盡民心。

sentences.english: He remained popular throughout his tenure of the office of mayor.
sentences.chinese: 他在擔任市長的整個任期內都深得民心。

sentences.english: So, if we are honest with the people, we will reach their hearts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果我們誠實待人，我們將得民心。

sentences.english: The main idea is the people are more important than the kings.
sentences.chinese: 民貴君輕，民心向背是儒家民本思想的主旨。

sentences.english: That way, Japan might actually get some decent government.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的話，日本也許就能擁有順民意得民心的政府。

sentences.english: Route the project becomes the masses Jiao Kou praise "popular feelings project".
sentences.chinese: 路徑工程成爲羣衆交口讚譽的“民心工程”。

sentences.english: During his reign, Tang lightened taxes and encouraged production to appease the morale.
sentences.chinese: 湯建立商朝後，減輕徵賦，鼓勵生產，安撫民心。

sentences.english: Regan remained popular throughout his tenure of the office of president.
sentences.chinese: 里根在擔任總統職務的整個任期都一直深得民心。

sentences.english: How in-depth public opinion, meaning people can shun long-term stability.
sentences.chinese: 如何深入民意，順意民心纔可以長治久安。

sentences.english: To keep the society stable is most important.
sentences.chinese: 保持社會穩定，是民心所向的重大問題。

sentences.english: Prince William's trip popular, and greatly welcome the public.
sentences.chinese: 威廉王子之行深得民心，大受民衆歡迎。

sentences.english: Personnel selection and appointment relations public support and success or failure of the party's cause.
sentences.chinese: 選人用人，關係民心向背和黨的事業的興衰成敗。

sentences.english: The environment-friendly project is a “popularity-winning” project.
sentences.chinese: 這個環保工程是個“民心工程”。

sentences.english: And it was he who loomed largest in the public mind after his historic election.
sentences.chinese: 也正是他，在其歷史性的勝選之後收穫民心。

sentences.english: The Party's fine style of work is a great force holding Party members together and winning popular support.
sentences.chinese: 優良的黨風是凝聚黨心民心的巨大力量。

definition: that which is yearned for by the public
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
not to enjoy popular support/to be unpopular
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
Aimin district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang
